Title: Victims And Shooter Identified In Nashville School Killings
Description: Three children and three adults died after a shooter stormed the small private school.

Title: Train Derails In Rural North Dakota, Causes Chemical Spill
Description: Local authorities and the railroad said there is no threat to public safety.

Title: Wisconsin School Won't Allow Students To Perform Miley Cyrus And Dolly Parton's Song
Description: Heyer Elementary School administrators have argued that "Rainbowland," which promotes LGBTQ acceptance, could be "perceived as controversial."

Title: Biden Repeats Plea For Assault Weapons Ban In Wake Of Nashville Shooting
Description: “We have to do more to stop gun violence. It’s ripping our communities apart," the president said after three children and three adults were killed at a Nashville school.

Title: Rick Scott Suggests 'Automatic Death Penalty' For School Shooters
Description: The Florida Republican pitched the idea after a school shooting Wednesday in which police immediately killed the perpetrator.

Title: Woman Interrupts Fox News Broadcast With Passionate Call For Gun Control
Description: The activist urged Congress to take action after the mass shooting at a private Christian grade school in Nashville.

Title: GOP Senators Push Resolution To Overturn Biden's Student Debt Plan
Description: The proposed measure is going through a fast-track process requiring a simple majority to pass.

Title: Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee Wants To Become The First Black Woman Mayor Of Houston
Description: Two Black men and two white women have served as mayors of the Texas city.

Title: Florida Plastic Surgeon Accused Of Murdering Missing Lawyer
Description: Dr. Tomasz Kosowski is accused of killing a lawyer missing since last week from a firm that represents former co-workers the doctor has been suing in a business dispute.

Title: Twitter's Value Has Plummeted Since Elon Took Over, Elon Says
Description: Twitter Blue subscriptions aren't even close to making up the difference.
